Thanks azkiller7, your pcsx2 uploads are great, I have already used several of them. This build in particular is VERY fast, and I managed to get full or playable speeds on games that were unplayable before on my 2.4Ghz Q6600 (eg Dark Cloud, Dragon Quest VIII). I recommend it to everyone.
